amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to conduct a study of the environmental impact on intercontinental ballistic missiles and their facilities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 52 printed in House Report 113-170 to prohibit the use of funds to conduct an environmental impact study on ICBMs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A046) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A046) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
